Property.name: leaf
Property.comment: true if this node is a leaf and does not have children @cfg {String} id The id for this node. If one is not specified, one is generated. @constructor @param {Object} attributes The attributes/config for the node

Property.name: pathSeparator
Property.comment: The token used to separate paths in node ids (defaults to '/').

Event.name: append
Event.comment: Fires when a new child node is appended to a node in this tree.

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index of the newly appended node

Event.name: append
Event.comment: Fires when a new child node is appended

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index of the newly appended node

Event.name: beforeappend
Event.comment: Fires before a new child is appended to a node in this tree, return false to cancel the append.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be appended

Event.name: beforeappend
Event.comment: Fires before a new child is appended, return false to cancel the append.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be appended

Event.name: beforeinsert
Event.comment: Fires before a new child is inserted in a node in this tree, return false to cancel the insert.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be inserted

Param.name: refNode
Param.comment: The child node the node is being inserted before

Event.name: beforeinsert
Event.comment: Fires before a new child is inserted, return false to cancel the insert.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be inserted

Param.name: refNode
Param.comment: The child node the node is being inserted before

Event.name: beforemove
Event.comment: Fires before a node is moved to a new location in the tree. Return false to cancel the move.

Param.name: newParent
Param.comment: The new parent the node is moving to

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index it is being moved to

Event.name: beforemove
Event.comment: Fires before this node is moved to a new location in the tree. Return false to cancel the move.

Param.name: newParent
Param.comment: The new parent this node is moving to

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index it is being moved to

Event.name: beforeremove
Event.comment: Fires before a child is removed from a node in this tree, return false to cancel the remove.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be removed

Event.name: beforeremove
Event.comment: Fires before a child is removed, return false to cancel the remove.

Param.name: node
Param.comment: The child node to be removed

Event.name: insert
Event.comment: Fires when a new child node is inserted in a node in this tree.

Param.name: refNode
Param.comment: The child node the node was inserted before

Event.name: insert
Event.comment: Fires when a new child node is inserted.

Param.name: refNode
Param.comment: The child node the node was inserted before

Event.name: move
Event.comment: Fires when a node is moved to a new location in the tree

Param.name: oldParent
Param.comment: The old parent of this node

Param.name: newParent
Param.comment: The new parent of this node

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index it was moved to

Event.name: move
Event.comment: Fires when this node is moved to a new location in the tree

Param.name: oldParent
Param.comment: The old parent of this node

Param.name: newParent
Param.comment: The new parent of this node

Param.name: index
Param.comment: The index it was moved to

Event.name: remove
Event.comment: Fires when a child node is removed from a node in this tree.

Event.name: remove
Event.comment: Fires when a child node is removed
